reviews.review: It is a very fun and puzzling game to play and I love it
Simplismente incrivel, vale a pena com certeza.
a great sequel to a good game

In my opinion, Portal 2 is even better than the amazing [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/400/Portal/]previous game[/url]. Puzzles are more interesting and challenging, The story is much better, and the characters are instantly lovable.
Abgesehen von billigen Nachmachen ein Spielkonzept, dass es so kein zweites Mal gibt. Geil
it is very fun to play
Amazing game and a great sequel

Portal 2 (2011)

No me creo que este juego tenga ya 10 a√±os, es rid√≠culo que haya envejecido tan bien, esta es otra prueba mas de que la gente de Valve no tiene rival a la hora de hacer videojuegos, menci√≥n especial al doblaje castellano, el mejor que he o√≠do en un videojuego.

Yakko Warner said this was a ripoff of Portal 1 in the Animaniacs Reboot. If I could give him a negative review and share it to the masses, I abso-positive-lutely would. I wouldn't dare give Portal 2 a negative review, though. That'd just be a load of absolute bollocks.
finished it in like 3-4 days just cause of how damn good it is lol
i like portal. it's fun like you can customized your map from portal 2

One of valve best games.
Its ideal for his portal puzzles, adictive lore and low price during discounts.

holy i just finished this...in 12h im not increadibly smart but its a really fun game the story n stuff is just great
i actually like cared about all the characters even gladdos and the "moron" wheatly
what's better than the puzzles in portal 2? GLaDOS making fun of u the entire time
Un juego de puzzles muy bueno y con una historia entretenida.
